name: FoxDomotics
0:
”Alexa, open fox domotics”
”switch living room light on”
”bed room light off”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fox domotics
des:
Fox Domotics home automation now control via voice command through Alexa. Control your lights, Fan, AC Temp Control, Curtains, Door Locks etc...

You can use your voice to command each of the Fox Domotics devices like Wifi Touch Switches, Wifi Curtain Control, Wifi to IR Controller, Wifi RGBW controller etc...
